template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a HVAC building system that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Analyze real-time data to adjust HVAC settings safely, monitor outcomes, and report efficiency gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants me to generate a single-sentence prompt for an HVAC optimization task. Let me break down their requirements. They specified it needs to be plain English, under 40 words, and include analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting improvements.

Hmm, I need to make sure all four elements are covered concisely. Maybe start with the action verb to keep it active. "Optimize" could work as the main verb. Then fit in live data analysis, parameter adjustment with safety constraints, result monitoring, and performance reporting.

Let me check the word count. The initial draft might be too long. Need to combine elements without losing clarity. Perhaps use "while ensuring safe operation" to cover safety constraints. Then link monitoring and reporting at the end.

Wait, is there a simpler way to phrase it? Instead of listing each step, integrate them into a flow. Test different structures: "Analyze real-time data to adjust HVAC settings safely, monitor outcomes, and report efficiency gains." That’s 19 words. All elements are there, and it’s straightforward.
